entities.description: Considers the relationship where the victim is acquainted with the offender.
Defines the relationship between the victim and the offender as family members.
Defines the relationship between the victim and the offender as non-family members.

relationships.description: Indicates that the victim has an acquaintance relationship with the offender.
Indicates that the victim has a family relationship with the offender.
Indicates that the victim has a non-family relationship with the offender.
